A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Cool looking movie\, watched it twice already as I couldn't decide how I felt after the first time. Kylo Ren was my favorite character coming out of this movie\, most interesting anyway. But overall\, it should have been called \"The Battle of Crait: A Star Wars Story\" and been an interlude between episode 7 and 8. Nothing happened. Kind of a waste of an episode\, disappointed now that we only have one left.
